create_new_age.ponder.motor_extension.te: Note that energy consumption is proportional to stress capacity
Extensions allow you to configure motor stress capacity multiplier
Tired of your motors being overstressed? Use a motor extension!
create_new_age.ponder.generation.text_7: Note: GENERATOR COILS DO NOT GENERATE ROTATION, ONLY ELECTRICITY.
create_new_age.ponder.wires.text_3: Connector can pull energy from the block it stands on when 'Pull' mode is enabled. Modes are switched with a wrench
create_new_age.ponder.wires.text_4: Note that 'Pull' mode is only for compatibility with other mods and can't be used to extract energy from energizer/motor internal storage
create_new_age.ponder.wires.text_1: Wires are used to transfer energy from one place to another
create_new_age.ponder.wires.text_2: This block automatically pushes its energy to neighboring blocks. But what if it didn't do that?
create.tooltip.create_new_age.battery_is: _Battery controller_ must be located at the top of a _fluid tank_ filled with _electrolyte_.
